channel.title: Xenoblade: Love, Hate, Steal: Age of Ravens
channel.description: On the Gauntlet Blog I look at the *Xenoblade Chronicles* series-- what's good, what's bad, and most importantly what is worth stealing for ttrpgs. https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/xenoblade-love-hate-steal-age-of-ravens

item.title: Xenoblade: Love, Hate, Steal: Age of Ravens
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

On the Gauntlet Blog I look at the Xenoblade Chronicles series-- what’s good, what’s bad, and most importantly what is worth stealing for ttrpgs.

THE GAUNTLET

Xenoblade: Love, Hate, Steal: Age of Ravens

I have a few video game series that I’ve seriously invested in—played heavily, thought about a ton, and even been angry about. I want to analyze a few of those. I’m focusing on series with at...
